name: Lyca Gella | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
name_original: Lyca Gella | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
description:
Retro Run is a 1 – level 3D Game that allows the users to experience retro style graphics, sounds, and mechanics which was a style and was popular in the late 80’s and so on.  The objectives are as follows:

  • Collect the stars
  • Avoid obstacles in order not to be killed
  • -reach the finish line which is located at the end of the road
